data.title: Attorney Talia Landry Receives Ascending Alumni Award
data.meta_description: DWPM is proud to announce that Attorney Talia Landry has been named a recipient of the Western New England School of Law Ascending Alumni Award. data.meta_site_name: Law Offices of Doherty, Wallace, Pillsbury & Murphy
data.text:
DWPM is proud to announce that Attorney Talia Landry has been named a recipient of the Western New England School of Law Ascending Alumni Award. The award recognizes alumni within ten years of graduation from the School of Law and have shown leadership in their chosen field and the community. According to the school, the award is given to those alumni who “stand out among their peers and have a great deal of drive and potential.”

Attorney Landry was recognized for her mentoring and serving as an example for young attorneys and law students. Her nomination for the award notes that “Talia is a person of substance who is making a positive impact on many in western Massachusetts. . . In her work as a probate attorney and general practice litigator, Talia continues to carry what few hold: kindness for others, a strong sense of self, and compassion for the marginalized.”

Attorney Landry practices in the area of civil litigation and probate.
